title: I got a 14 day banned because my friend started  inting
body: i did write hateful comments but that is because he starting trolling and i lashed out. this was my first ban and i strongly feel i dont deserve it because,  he said his mouse disconnected but sent me a video of him walking to bot and and dying to tower, giving my lane oppenents kills and giving tem a lead. he said "i was 0/4 that game was over anyways" and proceeded to intentionally feed (and sold all his items). Please respond and act upon this. i would at least ask for a shorter ban

replies.body:
so because he Int feeds you believe flaming his is the best thing to do?

And you got the 14 day ban because you flame consistently.

try to not flame people and you won't get in trouble.

>I got a 14 day banned because I was toxic

FTFY

If this is your first punishment, it should be noted that certain language is subject to a zero tolerance policy, and can earn a 14-day ban on the first offense.

If it is NOT your first punishment (i.e. you have been chat restricted before) each subsequent punishment without proper reform escalates you to the next level.

------------

If you're uncertain what you did to deserve this punishment, feel free to share your chat logs. I or another player here can help you see what might have earned an escalated punishment.

Hi .

I read "because" and i got salty .
So if toxicity is answered with toxicity , you get reported and enjoy the consequences. 
It doesnt matter the reason why you flamed, it matters that you flamed ! 
By doing so , you make the experience of the game worse than if he only ints cuz now theres 2 of you being toxic.
On anoher note you dont get punished for just one game so im sure it wasnt your first .
Sorry to hear about your account but..not sorry.
